title: Madame Chiang's Chinese Cookbook Cover
creator: Yep, Frank (translator)
image note: Cover page of a 1941 Chinese cookbook.

title: Madame Chiang's Chinese Cookbook: Chow Mein recipes
creator: Yep, Frank (translator)
image note: Pages of Chow Mein recipes.Illustrations above recipes portrays racist caricature of a China man.

title: Madame Chiang's Chinese Cookbook: Chop Suey Recipes
creator: Yep, Frank (translator)
image note: Pages of Chop Suey recipes. Illustrations above recipes portrays racist caricature of a China man.

title: Madame Chiang's Chinese Cookbook: Introductory Page
creator: Yep, Frank (translator)
image note: Introdcutory Page about Chinese Cooking. Highlights the exoticism that Chinese cuisine had from the American public.

title: Chinese Japanese Cookbook Cover
creator: Bosse, Sarah; Watanna, Onoto
image note: Cover page of a 1914 Chinese cookbook. Cover illustration depicts a woman in traditional Japanese clothing

title: Preface of Chinese Japanese Cookbook
creator: Bosse, Sarah; Watanna, Onoto
image note: Preface of Chinese Japanese cookbook. Primarily expressing that Oriental dishes would no longer be naturally repungant to Americans.

title: Chinese Japanese Cookbook: Cake Recipes
creator: Bosse, Sarah; Watanna, Onoto
image note: Recipes of Cakes.

title: Chinese Japanese Cookbook: Rules of Cooking
creator: Bosse, Sarah; Watanna, Onoto
image note: Rules of Cooking within Chinese cooking. Highlighting cleaniness as the primary rule

title: Chinese Japanese Cookbook: Boiling Rice and Tea
creator: Bosse, Sarah; Watanna, Onoto
image note: Rules of cooking instructing on how to boil rice and prepare tea.

title: Chinese Japanese Cookbook: List of Groceries
creator: Bosse, Sarah; Watanna, Onoto
image note: Page of Groceries for ingredients used in the Chinese and Japanese dishes

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1917 Cover
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: Cover page of a 1971 Chinese Cookbook. An illustrated man dressed in Chinese garments.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1917: Image of Chinese Dishes
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: A photo within the cookbook displaying the dishes of Chicken Chow Mein, Parsley Duck and Chop Suey.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1917: Ordering Ingredients Example
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: A page within the 1971 cookbook that provides a format on how to order ingredients for the dishes.

title: Preface of The Chinese Cookbook 1917
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: Preface of the cookbook which promotes Chinese dishes as superior.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1917: Image of Chinese Cooking Ingredients
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: A photo within the cookbook showing multiple ingredients used in Chinese cooking.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1917: Fish Ball Recipe
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: A page on how to make fishballs with the Mandarin word for it. A visual illustration on how to squeeze and mold them.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1917: Ingredients and Their Price
creator: Chan, Shiu Wong
image note: A page on the ingredients used in Chinese dishes and their prices.Ingredients are also provided in the Mandarin.

title: Chinese and English Cookbook Cover
creator: Chong Jan & Co
image note: Cover of a 1913 Chinese cookbook.

title: Chinese and English Cookbook: Contents
creator: Chong Jan & Co
image note: Contents of the 1913 cookbook. Languages are provided in both Mandarin and English.

title: Chinese and English Cookbook: Recipe Page
creator: Chong Jan & Co
image note: A recipe page on how to boil ham. Languages are in Mandarin and English.

title: Chinese and English Cookbook: Glossary of Words
creator: Chong Jan & Co
image note: A glossary page on ingredients used in cooking with their Mandarin translation provided.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1936 Cover
creator: Sing Au, M
image note: Cover of a 1936 Chinese cookbook.Illustration on cover of a presumably figure of Chinese origin.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1936: Introduction
creator: Sing Au, M
image note: Introductory page of 1936 Chinese cookbook. Promoting the economic and healthy aspect of Chinese cooking. Small section on the primary methods of Chinese cooking is provided.

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1936: Advertisment Page
creator: Sing Au, M
image note: An advertisment page of products from the La Choy company

title: The Chinese Cookbook 1936: Tofu and Salad Recipes
creator: Sing Au, M
image note: Pages of different tofu and salad recipes. Small illustrations of Chinese origins and quotes of Chinese idioms are found on the bottom of each page.
